name: Aryaduta Menteng
detail: The Aryaduta used to be a Hyatt, then I think they cancelled the management contract. However, it remains a very good, centrally located business hotel and a great deal at the price since they still try to maintain the same standards. More convenient for those visiting government offices than businesses, because it is rather located on the edge of the central government quarter rather than in the downtown commercial district (SCBD)a couple of kilometres away. I have lived a couple of years in Jakarta, still visit reasonably often, and typically stay at the Aryaduta if I need a hotel in Jakarta.

name: Classic Hotel
detail: Wonderful hotel with best hospitality. Including all the entertainments. Rooms were clean. Very friendly staff. Many clubs inside the hotel premises. Many spas too. Beautiful dancing ladies and live DJ events everyday. Massive hotel all together. Very tasty breakfast too. This hotel is the best hotel in Jakarta. 10 out of 10.

name: Townhouse Oak Ancol
detail: The property offers excellent value for money

name: Hotel Borobudur Jakarta
detail: This is one of the three hotels that I prefer for my stays in Jakarta. It has a lot of Indonesian charm and great outdoor facilities (running track and 50 yrd pool). The staff is super friendly -- even though the queuing systems for check-in could be improved. :-) On weekends, I also recommend asking for a quiet floor because this hotel can attract a lot of families and wedding parties -- which at times I prefer to avoid. Also the breakfast area on weekends can become very crowded -- which at times leads me to book a room without breakfast. Again, I consider this of my favorite hotels in Jakarta. Andreas S.

name: Liberty Hotel Jakarta Thamrin
detail: I have stayed at several boutique hotels in Jakarta and I can assure that this hotel is one of the best. Counter staff were friendly and attentive. The room I had was spacious as compared to other hotels in the same category and the bed and pillows were AMAZING. Walking distance to Grand Indonesia mall and train station (airport express) is a plus. I would definitely recommend you this hotel!

name: ARTOTEL Thamrin Jakarta
detail: I've stayed twice at Atotel. When I was looking for hotels I came across this hotel, hmm.. Interesting concept. I booked & I have not regretted choosing Artotel. When I entered Artotel I was like WOW! The smell was so fresh & nice. I luv the deco. I myself luv arts. I think it's really great they came up with this getting few artist to paint in the rooms..thruout the hotel. I was telling myself I wished Malaysia had something like this. The food.. I had breakfast & it wasn't that great. I think they need to improve. I ordered the room service chicken wings...that was nice. There are times I'm sure some guest who are so tired would like to stay in their room, order room service, relax... Laundry..I snd my white blouse & few others for a wash.. My white blouse came back in light baby blue color & it wasn't iron properly & same as the rest too... I told d staff about it & they apologise.. Most hotels I've stayed when I ask for iron they give me the usual normal iron but at Artotel it's steam iron. I prefer steam iron as it's easier for me. At Artotel they think of everything they could to make it easier for their guest. In Indonesia their plug is different than Malaysia or in England so they made sure they had that install so the guest don't really need to buy an adapter. You can't expect everything to be perfect at all the hotels, even at a 5 or 6 star hotels you get some faulty too. Sometime things do happen. Besides that I really do like Artotel. It's one of my favourite hotel in Jakarta. I would definitely stay at Artotel again & I highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

name: Holiday Inn & Suites Jakarta Gajah Mada By IHG
detail: After a few dodgy 4* hotels in Jakarta booked previously, this one is definitely my favourite. Staff was great and attentive, my room was spacious and ultra clean, food in the restaurant was superb, I really cannot complain. Loved it.

name: Kosenda Hotel
detail: I love this hotel so much. I am so glad I get to experience this place. I got the petit room. Yes it is small but they maximized the space with everything you need and the attention to every detail of the room is just mesmerizing. This, by far, is the best affordable hotel in Jakarta. I have stayed in more expensive hotels in Jakarta but nothing beats how amazing my experience was. Yes the place is tiny but is very much worth it.

name: AYANA Midplaza Jakarta
detail: The hotel is a good location, in the heart of Jakarta. Great facilities with Pool, sauna, spa, and fitness center which can make you relax and fresh. When afternoon time comes, I really enjoy afternoon cocktail at Rimba Ayana Jakarta. The room is clean and spacious space, but my room has an old tv. The hotel should change it with flat tv the new one. My bad experience coming from staff. From the first time, I arrive at the front door, no greeting, no smile, until i must wait 15-20 mins for check in, even when i have a breakfast, why there is no smile on your face and greetings? Please smile and your manner also need to improve. Greeting, smile , what ever the person is coming from. Over all, i'm realy enjoyed my staycation at Ayana Mid Plaza Jakarta. And Thank you for your smile and having time to share with humble one Mr. Christian Rene Hochtl, GM of Ayana Mid Plaza Hotel.

name: Gran Mahakam Hotel
detail: Rooms are a bit small, and bathroom even smaller, but this has to be the greatest boutique hotel in Jakarta - you get 5-star service and comfort in a small package. Popular among locals for weddings, and really interesting to see guests in their traditional Javanese attire. Lots of dining choices, and it's the type of location where a foreigner can enjoy walking around and being in a relatively quiet and cosy part of Jakarta.
